00066         int port = 0,
00067         const std::string &protocol = stdEmptyString,
00068         bool enabled = false,
00069         const std::string &description = stdEmptyString);

00073         { return m_port; }

00075         { return m_protocol; }

00077         { return m_enabled; }

00079         { return m_description; }

00148 
00149 class CUPnPControlPoint;
00150 
00151 /*
00152  * Even though we can retrieve the upnpLib handler from the upnpControlPoint,
00153  * we must pass it separetly at this point, because the class CUPnPControlPoint
00154  * must be declared after.
00155  *
00156  * CUPnPLib can only be removed from the constructor once we agree to link to
00157  * UPnPLib explicitly, making this dlopen() stuff unnecessary.
00158  */
00159 template <typename T, char const *XML_ELEMENT_NAME, char const *XML_LIST_NAME>
00160 class CXML_List : public std::map<const std::string, T *>
00161 {
00162 public:
00163     CXML_List(
00164         const CUPnPControlPoint &upnpControlPoint,
00165         CUPnPLib &upnpLib,
00166         IXML_Element *parent,
00167         const std::string &url);
00168     ~CXML_List();
00169 };
00170 
00171 
00172 template <typename T, char const *XML_ELEMENT_NAME, char const *XML_LIST_NAME>
00173 CXML_List<T, XML_ELEMENT_NAME, XML_LIST_NAME>::CXML_List(
00174     const CUPnPControlPoint &upnpControlPoint,
00175     CUPnPLib &upnpLib,
00176     IXML_Element *parent,
00177     const std::string &url)
00178 {
00179     IXML_Element *elementList =
00180         upnpLib.Element_GetFirstChildByTag(parent, XML_LIST_NAME);
00181     unsigned int i = 0;
00182     for (   IXML_Element *element = upnpLib.Element_GetFirstChildByTag(elementList, XML_ELEMENT_NAME);
00183         element;
00184         element = upnpLib.Element_GetNextSiblingByTag(element, XML_ELEMENT_NAME)) {
00185         // Add a new element to the element list
00186         T *upnpElement = new T(upnpControlPoint, upnpLib, element, url);
00187         (*this)[upnpElement->GetKey()] = upnpElement;
00188         ++i;
00189     }
00190     std::ostringstream msg;
00191     msg << "\n    " << XML_LIST_NAME << ": " <<
00192         i << " " << XML_ELEMENT_NAME << "s.";
00193     AddDebugLogLineN(logUPnP, msg);
00194 }
00195 
00196 
00197 template <typename T, char const *XML_ELEMENT_NAME, char const *XML_LIST_NAME>
00198 CXML_List<T, XML_ELEMENT_NAME, XML_LIST_NAME>::~CXML_List()
00199 {
00200     typename CXML_List<T, XML_ELEMENT_NAME, XML_LIST_NAME>::iterator it;
00201     for(it = this->begin(); it != this->end(); ++it) {
00202         delete (*it).second;
00203     }
00204 }

00410 class CUPnPService
00411 {
00412 private:
00413     const CUPnPControlPoint &m_UPnPControlPoint;
00414     CUPnPLib &m_upnpLib;
00415     const std::string m_serviceType;
00416     const std::string m_serviceId;
00417     const std::string m_SCPDURL;
00418     const std::string m_controlURL;
00419     const std::string m_eventSubURL;
00420     std::string m_absSCPDURL;
00421     std::string m_absControlURL;
00422     std::string m_absEventSubURL;
00423     int m_timeout;
00424     Upnp_SID m_SID;
00425     std::auto_ptr<CUPnPSCPD> m_SCPD;
00426     
00427 public:
00428     CUPnPService(
00429         const CUPnPControlPoint &upnpControlPoint,
00430         CUPnPLib &upnpLib,
00431         IXML_Element *service,
00432         const std::string &URLBase);
00433     ~CUPnPService();
00434     
00435     const std::string &GetServiceType() const
00436         { return m_serviceType; }
00437     const std::string &GetServiceId() const
00438         { return m_serviceId; }
00439     const std::string &GetSCPDURL() const
00440         { return m_SCPDURL; }
00441     const std::string &GetAbsSCPDURL() const
00442         { return m_absSCPDURL; }
00443     const std::string &GetControlURL() const
00444         { return m_controlURL; }
00445     const std::string &GetEventSubURL() const
00446         { return m_eventSubURL; }
00447     const std::string &GetAbsControlURL() const
00448         { return m_absControlURL; }
00449     const std::string &GetAbsEventSubURL() const
00450         { return m_absEventSubURL; }
00451     int GetTimeout() const
00452         { return m_timeout; }
00453     void SetTimeout(int t)
00454         { m_timeout = t; }
00455     int *GetTimeoutAddr()
00456         { return &m_timeout; }
00457     char *GetSID()
00458         { return m_SID; }
00459     void SetSID(const char *s)
00460         { memcpy(m_SID, s, sizeof(Upnp_SID)); }
00461     const std::string &GetKey() const
00462         { return m_serviceId; }
00463     bool IsSubscribed() const
00464         { return m_SCPD.get() != NULL; }
00465     void SetSCPD(CUPnPSCPD *SCPD)
00466         { m_SCPD.reset(SCPD); }
00467     
00468     bool Execute(
00469         const std::string &ActionName,
00470         const std::vector<CUPnPArgumentValue> &ArgValue) const;
00471     const std::string GetStateVariable(
00472         const std::string &stateVariableName) const;
00473 };

00554 class CUPnPControlPoint
00555 {
00556 private:
00557     static CUPnPControlPoint *s_CtrlPoint;
00558     // upnp stuff
00559     CUPnPLib m_upnpLib;
00560     UpnpClient_Handle m_UPnPClientHandle;
00561     RootDeviceMap m_RootDeviceMap;
00562     ServiceMap m_ServiceMap;
00563     PortMappingMap m_ActivePortMappingsMap;
00564     CUPnPMutex m_RootDeviceListMutex;
00565     bool m_IGWDeviceDetected;
00566 //#warning This variable is for testing purposes only and should disappear on release.
00567     CUPnPService *m_WanService;
00568     CUPnPMutex m_WaitForSearchTimeoutMutex;
00569 
00570 public:
00571     CUPnPControlPoint(unsigned short udpPort);
00572     ~CUPnPControlPoint();
00573     void Subscribe(CUPnPService &service);
00574     void Unsubscribe(CUPnPService &service);
00575     bool AddPortMappings(
00576         std::vector<CUPnPPortMapping> &upnpPortMapping);
00577     bool DeletePortMappings(
00578         std::vector<CUPnPPortMapping> &upnpPortMapping);
00579     
00580     UpnpClient_Handle GetUPnPClientHandle() const
00581         { return m_UPnPClientHandle; }
00582 
00583     bool GetIGWDeviceDetected() const
00584         { return m_IGWDeviceDetected; }
00585     void SetIGWDeviceDetected(bool b)
00586         { m_IGWDeviceDetected = b; }
00587     bool WanServiceDetected() const
00588         { return !m_ServiceMap.empty(); }
00589     void SetWanService(CUPnPService *service)
00590         { m_WanService = service; }
00591 
00592     // Callback function
00593     static int Callback(
00594         Upnp_EventType EventType,
00595         void* Event,
00596         void* Cookie);
00597     
00598 private:
00599     void OnEventReceived(
00600         const std::string &Sid,
00601         int EventKey,
00602         IXML_Document *ChangedVariables);
00603     void AddRootDevice(
00604         IXML_Element *rootDevice,
00605         const std::string &urlBase,
00606         const char *location,
00607         int expires);
00608     void RemoveRootDevice(
00609         const char *udn);
00610     void RefreshPortMappings();
00611     bool PrivateAddPortMapping(
00612         CUPnPPortMapping &upnpPortMapping);
00613     bool PrivateDeletePortMapping(
00614         CUPnPPortMapping &upnpPortMapping);
00615 };
